form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, N-400 ( (Rev. 5-5-83) N

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/14/2023 APPLICANT TO BE EXAMINED lent letter requesting in Chinese because she to bring interpreter to interview on 4-9-85 has been here for 21 years. UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OMB NO. 1115-0009 IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE Approval Expires 1/31/84 FEE STAMP APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION 5-17-85 Mail or take to: 9100 IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE 194224 Ack Needs interpreter 3/20 ALIEN REGISTRATION (See INSTRUCTIONS. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT. PLEASE PRINT OR receipt card, and the number of your card. If you did not register, so state.) Name Sau Ghan Chau TYPE.) 94H No. A 13 570 214 Section of Law 316a Date: (Leave Blank) (1) My full true and correct name is Sau Ghan Chau (Full true name without abbreviations) (2) I now live at 2324 Griffin Avenue Mail to: 568 Otero Court Clos Angeles, California 90031 Number and street, ) Camarillo, Calif 93010 244 City county, state, zip code) (3) I was born on Jan. 29, 1910 in Mow Kong, Hoi Ping, Kwong Tung, China (Month) (Day) (Year) NONE City or town) (County, province, or state) (4) I request that my name be changed to n/a I (Country) (5) Other names I have used are: none (Include maiden name) Sex: Male Female (6) Was your father or mother ever a United States citizen? Yes K No (If "Yes", explain fully) (7) Can you read and write English? Yes No (8) Can you speak English? Yes (9) Can you sign your name in English? No 550/20 Yes No (10) My lawful admission for permanent residence was on Jan. 07 1963 under the name of Sau Ghan Chau (Month) (Day) (Year) at Los Angeles, California (City) (State) (11) (a) I have resided continuously in the United States since January 07 1963 (Month) (Day) (Year) (b) I have resided continuously in the State of California since Jan.. 7, 1963 (Month) (Day) (Year) (c) During the last five years I have been physically in the United States for a total of sixty (60) months. (12) Do you intend to reside permanently in the United States? Yes No If "No," explain: (13) In what places in the United States have you lived during the last 5 years? List present address FIRST. FROM To STREET ADDRESS CITY AND STATE (a) Dec. 82 PRESENT TIME 2324 Griffin Ave. Los Angeles, Calif. (b) July 1966 Dec. 1982 568 Otero Court Camarillo, Calif. (c) 19 19 (d) 19 19 NO OTHERS (14) (a) Have you been out of the United States since your lawful admission as a permanent resident? Yes No If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence of less than 6 months, no matter how short it was. DATE DEPARTED NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES n/a NONES (b) Since your lawful admission, have you been out of the United States for a period of 6 months or longer? Yes No If "No", state "None"; If "Yes", fill in following information for every absence of more than 6 months. DATE DEPARTED NAME OF SHIP OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES n/a NONE Form N-400 (Rev. 5-5-83) N (OVER) (1)
